meta.label: Sound labeling
meta.description: Manually classify sounds from a folder for use in supervised learning

params.name: unlabeled
params.label: Sounds
params.description: Folder containing sound files to label

params.name: labels_ds
params.label: Labels dataset
params.description: Dataset to save the labels into

params.name: metadata_ds
params.label: Labeling metadata dataset
params.description: Contains additional information such as annotator and timestamps for each labeling

params.name: label_col_name
params.label: Labels target column name
params.description: Name of the label column in the Labels dataset

params.name: queries_ds
params.label: Queries
params.description: Dataset containing queries to label along with their confidence score
